EmailTemplate.name: VMworld Europe 2014 VIP Party.Reg Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: VMTurbo VMworld Europe VIP Cocktail Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
You are confirmed! We are enthralled to hear you'll be joining us at Silvestre on Tuesday, 14 October after a lightspeed day at VMworld.
Be sure to fasten your seatbelt, stop by Booth #B111, and learn about the New Hope for the Datacenter.
VMTurbo VIP Cocktail Reception Tuesday, 14 October, 2014 | 8:00 - 10:00 p.m. Silvestre Carrer de Santaló 101 08021 Barcelona, Spain
From the Rebellion Vanguard, Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
